message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional opportunity to you. The product I have to offer is truly unique and valuable, worth $12000 to you based on our discussions. I am offering it to you at a special price of $11500. This is an excellent chance for you to secure a high-quality item at a price that is below its market value. I believe this deal will be mutually beneficial, allowing you to acquire something of great worth while also providing me with a fair return for my investment. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
